remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将返回当前列间隔。Getting this property returns the current column gap. 设置此值将更改当前有效的列间距，并可能导致内容重排。Setting this value changes the currently effective column gap, and may cause content to reflow. 列间隔不能超过当前的 负任何 。The column gap cannot exceed the current minus any . 如果该属性的值 超过此限制，则会减小有效的列间隙以观察此限制。If the value of the property exceeds this limit, the effective column gap is reduced to observe this limit. 如果为，则此属性不起作用 `null` 。This property has no effect if is `null`. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 大于 或等于0.0 但小于的值的字符串表示形式 。String representation of a value equal to or greater than 0.0 but smaller than . 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 上面所述的 *双精度* 值 (只不过 `Auto`) ，后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 、 `cm` 和 `pt` 。A *double* value as described above (excepting `Auto`), followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` (默认) 是与设备无关的单位， (每个单位 1/96th 每英寸) `px` (default) is device-independent units (1/96th inch per unit) `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px 自动Auto 使列之间的有效间距设置为属性的当前值 。Causes the effective spacing between columns to be set to the current value of the property. 等效于的属性值 。Equivalent to a property value of . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以 编程方式设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. remarks.format: ## Remarks 动态调整其内容以最大程度地提高可用显示空间内的内容。A dynamically adjusts its contents to maximize content presentation within the available display space. 根据此属性指定的最小列宽，可在可用显示空间中容纳的列数来确定可见列的数目。The number of visible columns is determined by the number of columns that can fit in available display space, given the minimum column width specified by this property. 实际列宽可能大于此属性指定的值。The actual column width may be greater than the value specified by this property. 在任一方向更改窗口大小都将导致列动态重新生成以充分利用空间。Changing the size of the window in either direction will result in columns being dynamically regenerated to make the best use of space. 通过这种方式，内容可以动态地适应用户的环境。In this way, the content dynamically adapts to the user's environment. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 大于 或等于0.0 但小于的值的字符串表示形式 。String representation of a value equal to or greater than 0.0 but smaller than . 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 如上所述的 *双精度* 值， (只不过 `Auto`) 后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 、 `cm` 和 `pt` 。A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` (默认) 是与设备无关的单位， (每个单位 1/96th 每英寸) `px` (default) is device-independent units (1/96th inch per unit) `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px 自动Auto 使列宽自动计算为当前的20倍 。Causes column width to be automatically calculated to be 20 times the current . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对子元素上的任何设置都将覆盖此顶级设置。Any settings on child elements will override this top-level setting. 指定多个系列后，第二个和后续的字体系列作为备用系列，在主要字体系列不可用或不适用的情况下使用。When multiple families are specified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 此属性仅指定一个首选项。This property specifies a preference only. 如果指定的字体系列不可用， 将以静默方式回退到由值确定的字体 。If the specified font family is not available, the will silently fall back to the font determined by the value. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *fontFamilyName**fontFamilyName* 指定字体系列名称的字符串。A string specifying a font family name.  例如 `"Arial"` 或 `"Century Gothic"`。For example, `"Arial"` or `"Century Gothic"`. *fontFamilyNamesList**fontFamilyNamesList* 指定多个字体系列名称的字符串（每个名称之间用逗号分隔） () 中忽略逗号之后的任何空白。A string specifying multiple font family names, each separated by a comma (any white space following a comma is ignored). 指定的第一个字体系列用作主要字体系列;在主要字体系列不可用或不适用的情况下，后续字体系列用作备用系列。The first font family specified serves as the primary font family; subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 例如，将 `"Arial, Century Gothic"` 宋体指定为主要字体系列，并将世纪宋指定为备用字体系列。For example, `"Arial, Century Gothic"` specifies Arial as the primary font family, with Century Gothic as the fallback font family. *fontFamilyFolderReference**fontFamilyFolderReference* 指定包含字体的文件夹以及字体系列名称的字符串。A string specifying a folder containing the font, along with a font family name. 文件夹和字体系列名称之间用 # 字符进行分隔。The folder and font family name are delimited by a # character. 文件夹引用可以是绝对的，也可以是相对的。The folder reference may be absolute, or relative. 例如，`"Custom Fonts\#My Custom Font"`。For example, `"Custom Fonts\#My Custom Font"`. *fontFamilyUriReference**fontFamilyUriReference* 一个字符串，指定 (URI) 的统一资源标识符，以及字体系列名称。A string specifying a uniform resource identifier (URI) for the font, along with a font family name. URI 和字体系列名称由 # 字符分隔。The URI and font family name are delimited by a # character. 例如，`"http://MyFontServer/Fonts/#My Custom Font"`。For example, `"http://MyFontServer/Fonts/#My Custom Font"`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 值是可变的还是固定的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the value is flexible or fixed.

value.span: 如果列宽是可变的，则为 ；如果列宽是固定的，则为 。

span.span: if the column width is flexible; if the column width is fixed.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定任何超出的内容区域宽度 (的方式，即页面宽度与内容布局后的宽度之间的差异) 在列之间分布。The property determines the manner in which any excess content area width (that is, the difference between the page width and the width of the content after it is laid out) is distributed among columns. 如果设置为 `true` ，则表示将额外的空间平均分配给每个列; 在这种情况下，列的大小可能会超出属性指定的宽度 。A setting of `true` means that the extra space is distributed equally to each column; in this case, columns may be sized wider than the width specified by the property. 的一项设置 `false` 是指向页面右侧的填充分配额外的空间; 在这种情况下，列的大小始终为属性所指定的宽度 (只要该宽度小于页面的宽度减去任何 ) 。A setting of `false` means excess space is distributed to the padding on the right side of the page; in this case, columns will always size to the width specified by the property (so long as that width is smaller than the width of the page minus any ). 下图说明了此属性为或时布局中的 `true` 差异 `false` 。The following figure illustrates the difference in layout when this property is `true` or `false`. 浅蓝色表示中内容的列 。Light blue represents columns of content in a . ![屏幕快照：比较 IsColumnWidthFlexible 值](~/add/media/flowdoc-columnflex.png "屏幕快照：比较 IsColumnWidthFlexible 值")![Screenshot: Compare IsColumnWidthFlexible values](~/add/media/flowdoc-columnflex.png "Screenshot: Compare IsColumnWidthFlexible values") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用自动断字功能 ，可以根据当前布局条件自动中断和断字。The automatic word hyphenation feature enables a to automatically break and hyphenate words, based on current layout conditions. 这样一来，就可以在一行中开始，并继续下一步，并在对齐文本中实现更均匀的空白分布。This enables long words to begin on one line and continue on this next, and tends to achieve a more even distribution of white space in justified text. 根据标准语法规则对单词进行断字和断字。Words are broken and hyphenated according to standard grammar rules. 与最佳段落布局结合使用时，自动断字特别有效 (由 属性) 表示。Automatic hyphenation is particularly effective when coupled with optimal paragraph layout (represented by the property). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 最佳段落布局是一项功能，可在中对段落进行布局，使 空白尽可能均匀地分布。Optimal paragraph layout is a feature that lays out paragraphs in the such that white space is distributed as evenly as possible. 从理论上讲，这通过消除行对齐文本和其他布局例程可能会出现的分散空白，提供了优化的阅读体验。Theoretically, this provides an optimized reading experience by eliminating distracting white space that can occur with line-justified text and other layout routines. 最佳段落布局在与) 属性表示的自动断字 (结合使用时特别有效 。Optimal paragraph layout is particularly effective when coupled with automatic hyphenation (represented by the property). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. value.span: 各行高度均介于 0.0034 到 160000 之间（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: The height of each line, in device independent pixels, in the range 0.0034 to 160000.

value.span: 值 (等效于属性值 "Auto" ) 导致自动根据当前的字体特征确定行高。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改此值不会更改关联文本的高度;相反，它更改包含文本的行的高度。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 若要更改文本大小，请使用 属性。To change the size of the text, use the property. 除了此属性，中的行布局还 受其属性的影响 。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 等于或大于 `0.0034` 且等于或小于的值的字符串表示形式 `160000` 。String representation of a value equal to or greater than `0.0034` and equal to or less then `160000`. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 如上所述的 *双精度* 值， (只不过 `Auto`) 后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 、 `cm` 和 `pt` 。A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` (默认) 是与设备无关的单位， (每个单位 1/96th 每英寸) `px` (default) is device-independent units (1/96th inch per unit) `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px 自动Auto 使行高由当前字体特征自动确定。Causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics. 等效于的属性值 。Equivalent to a property value of . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示页面边界和页面内容之间填充空间的厚度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the thickness of padding space between the boundaries of a page and the page's content.

value.span: 一个 结构，它指定要应用的填充量（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of padding to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认为统一粗细，即零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在) (的所有方向 `PagePadding="10"` 上，或以四种不同的值表示左、上、右和下边距 () 分别表示为均匀 `PagePadding="5,0,10,20"` 。 can be described as uniform in all directions (`PagePadding="10"`), or as four distinct values that represent left, top, right, and bottom padding independently (`PagePadding="5,0,10,20"`). 如果指定的空白宽度超出了相应的页面尺寸 (例如，左边距和右边距宽度之和超过页面宽度) ，则填充的宽度将按比例缩小，使其不大于相关页面尺寸。If a specified padding thickness exceeds the corresponding page dimension (for example, the sum of the left and right padding widths exceeds the page width), the thickness of the padding will be proportionally reduced to be no greater than the relevant page dimension. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 要统一应用于所有四个厚度尺寸的单个值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，的值等效于的 `"10"` 值 `"10,10,10,10"` 。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四个有序值的字符串表示形式， 对应于 "左"、"上"、"右" 和 "下"，按此顺序排列。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 这四个值必须用逗号分隔;不允许使用空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 例如，"5，10，15，20" 将在内容左侧填充5个像素，在内容右侧填充10个像素，在内容右侧填充15个像素，在内容的下方填充20个像素。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of padding to the left of content, 10 pixels of padding above content, 15 pixels of padding to the right of content, and 20 pixels of padding below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* *UniformThickness* 描述的值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` (默认) 是与设备无关的单位， (每个单位 1/96th 每英寸) `px` (default) is device-independent units (1/96th inch per unit) `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如， `"1in"` 在所有方向上都提供1英寸的统一填充。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform padding of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* *IndependentThickness* 描述的值，每个独立值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` (默认) 是与设备无关的单位， (每个单位 1/96th 每英寸) `px` (default) is device-independent units (1/96th inch per unit) `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 可以在一个或多个值中混合或省略单元说明符。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示 了设置元素的属性的各种方式 。The following examples show various ways to set the attribute of a element.
